.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.1.0 (2017-12-03)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release on PyPI.
* Initial models and REST API.

0.2.0 (2017-12-11)
++++++++++++++++++

* Added Profile.
* Added ability to sync profile from LDAP.

0.3.0 (2017-01-05)
++++++++++++++++++

* Added REST API filters.

0.3.1 (2017-01-12)
++++++++++++++++++

* Fixed route names for SimpleRouter
